full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS MCHOD KYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR BA BSNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS NYUR BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS CES PA SHING MO SPRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGAS BGYIS SO,, ,,) SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
